Federico Vazzoler

Federico is an experimental physicist transitioning into data science, with strong expertise in data modeling and analysis.

A passionate ML and AI enthusiast, he believes in the untapped potential of data to reveal the future.

Professional experiences

Research Fellow

Teaching Assistant

  • Facilitated undergraduate physics courses and hands-on laboratory experiments.
